'''Forest Roamer''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Rainforest of Lore]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock all [[Teleport Waypoints]] in the following areas in Sumeru: [[Avidya Forest]], [[Lokapala Jungle]], [[Ardravi Valley]], [[Ashavan Realm]], [[Vissudha Field]], [[Lost Nursery]], and [[Vanarana]].
